name: Third Blade
summary: Take one-handled or two-handled sword, and go in fascinating and dangerous travel to destroy ominous monsters once and for ever! In the game there is a shop in which you will be able to find good weapon, regimentals, and also curative medicines. And if you become interested in abilities, for runes, you will be able to learn this or that attack. In the game there’s colorful graphics and special effects, a set of levels, some types of heroes and weapon, and also stunning game process!
